services.title: Commercial Transactions
services.subtitle: Commercial transactions include all things contractual which our clients may have with third parties.
text: Contract Pre-execution Stage: Pre-execution support includes guiding business with the right document for a particular business transaction, providing contract templates, drafting and reviewing of contracts, negotiations to enforce standards practises.

Contract Post-execution Stage: Post execution support includes analysing executed contracts to highlight risks and deviation from standard practises. Help renegotiate terms on behalf of our clients which protect their interest.
